channel.title: DeltaScape [V7] Development! Latest update: Real clan chat
channel.description:
Hello, and welcome to the next version of DeltaScape, version 7! This will be based on Dodian (like v5, and v6)
With this development, maybe people will stop saying 'eww dodian' 'dodian stinks!' 'it can never be turned into a good source'
Handlers made so far: Command handler [12 kb] Weapon animation handler(such as standing, hitting, walking) [5 kb] Special attacks handler [20 kb] Equipping items handler [12 kb] Food/potions handler [15 kb] Packet 185 (clicking most actionButtons) handler [24 kb] Client.java size: 401 kb Client.class size: 190 kb
Working on: Skills
Goals: To get all skills working To get fully working magic defence bonus and splashing To get lots of people to pk Clean out a lot of the client.java
Thinking of adding (but I don't want server to lag): Following Pest control
Features so far: Destroy item interface [URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img252.imageshack.us/img252/568/gallery9im2.png[/img][/URL] New barrows system. Instead of keys, you get points from each kill. This should be less confusing then looking at all the keys from v6 Real clan chat [URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img504.imageshack.us/img504/4329/gallery8lv1.png[/img][/URL] Fight caves (not easy like v6, waves are longer). Tztok-Jad uses 3 attacks, you have to switch prayer to prevent getting hit a 70+ [URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img175.imageshack.us/img175/7775/gallery5fb0.png[/img][/URL] Removed dueling Animations fixed up (you don't repeat an animation like 5000 times) Fully working attack speeds Fully working 1v1 combat Fixed up magic graphics, so it doesn't always use the ice barrage graphics [URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img166.imageshack.us/img166/5035/gallery4kk9.png[/img][/URL] Fully working range on players and npcs [URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img503.imageshack.us/img503/6569/gallery3la2.png[/img][/URL] Working special attack with double hitting and facing gfx [URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img175.imageshack.us/img175/5058/gallery1hx2.png[/img][/URL] Fully working prayer including protect prayers [URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img520.imageshack.us/img520/7923/gallery2js3.png[/img][/URL] Fully working potions [URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img503.imageshack.us/img503/4429/gallery6dj8.png[/img][/URL]
Will post more later after I think of more ideas

@x0_0wn wrote:

I have a suggestion.

Make a dungeon that you need a certain combat level to enter.

Have lots of AGGRESSIVE monsters.

Without them the dungeon would be easy…

And make sure the monsters drop good items, but not all the time.

And make sure it’s not easy…
